en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
Desculpe, parece que nós não conseguimos conectar aos servidores do Jackbox Games.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
Desculpe, ocorreu um erro na conexão e sua sala foi destruida.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente.
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_LOBBY_TIMEOUT:
Desculpe, ocorreu um erro na conexão e sua sala foi destruida.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente. (Motivo: 1)

en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: Desculpe, você perdeu sua conexão com os servidores do Jackbox Games.
en.TIMEOUT:
Desculpe, não estamos conseguindo conectar aos servidores do Jackbox Games.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: Desculpe, você foi desconectado pelo servidor. Por favor, tente novamente.
en.LOST_LICENSE: Desculpe, nós perdemos a licensa para esse conteúdo!
en.STEAM_ERROR: Desculpe, nós não conseguimos validar a sua licensa STEAM.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: Desculpe, nós não conseguimos validar a sua inscrição Prime da Twitch.
en.LOST_DLC: Desculpe, a licensa para a sua DLC não foi encontrada. Voltando para o menu...
en.PLAY_DESCRIPTION: Crie uma sala de jogos e jogue
en.CONNECTING: Conectando-se aos serviços da Jackbox Games
en.CONNECTING_DELAY:
Isso está demorando um pouco...
Verifique sua conexão com a Internet.
en.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: no seu dispositivo móvel para participar
en.ENTER_ROOM_CODE: e digite o código do quarto
en.AUDIENCE_SOUNDBOARD_PROMPT: Toque em um botão repetidamente para escolher onde o raio cairá. Os sons serão acionados quando um número suficiente de membros da audiência tiver tocado.
en.NAMING_HEADER_TEXT: HINT: A name that will attract attention, but won't reveal you wrote it.
en.NAMING_ERROR_TEXT: Someone already invited [guest]%s[/guest]. Write a different name!
en.DRAWING_HEADER_TEXT: Draw this weapon and hide your calling card in it:
en.CHOOSING_MURDER_WEAPON_PROMPT_TEXT: Pick a weapon to murder with.
en.INCLUSIVE_MURDER_HINT: [header]WRONG[/header][line]It wasn't %s.[/line][header]CLUE[/header][line]%s works for a different player with %s in their name.[/line]
en.EXCLUSIVE_MURDER_HINT: [header]WRONG[/header][line]It wasn't %s.[/line][header]CLUE[/header][line]The player %s works for doesn't have any %s's in their name.[/line]
en.MURDERING_SUCCESSFUL_TEXT: [line]CORRECT[/line][line]You've murdered %s (and earned a Murder Point.)[/line][line]But be quiet about it![/line]
en.AUDIENCE_STABBING_PROMPT_TEXT: [header]While the detectives are murdering[/header][line]Take a Stab in the Dark[/line]
AUDIENCE_STABBING_MISS_MESSAGES: Total waste of a stab motion.
You missed. But no one saw it.
AUDIENCE_STABBING_HIT_MESSAGES: You nicked someone’s elbow!
You grazed a cheek!
Your knife went into something and you heard a "squelch." No telling what that was.
You struck flesh! But it was just the roast pig on the buffet table.
You stabbed the curtains and got all tangled up like a real buffoon.
Where is all this anger coming from?
Success! You’ve murdered someone in the audience. This affects nothing, other than your own sense of guilt.
You murdered "Uncle Paul" who happened to be playing this game with his nephews in Portland, Oregon. Services will be held this Saturday at St. Catherine’s.
You have stabbed your own thigh and are bleeding profusely.
You meant to stab, but forgot what you were doing halfway through and just stared off into space for awhile.
You stabbed someone! It turns out they were your soulmate and, if you had just introduced yourself, you would have had 50 long and happy years together. But instead you stabbed them.
You stabbed Tom Hanks! What was he doing at this party?! Luckily he’s fine and is being super nice about it.
You stabbed a man named Dr. Tobias Evilone. So, thank you?
Your knife cut through the air and sliced the thin ether between the realms. You hit a parallel universe version of yourself named Hork Jr.
You put all your weight into the stab and accidentally flung yourself down the cellar stairs.
Right as you were stabbing you realized you stab weird? Even in the dark, you can tell everyone is judging you.
Your knife grazed someone’s jeans, turning them into stylish distressed jeans.
You tried to stab, but ended up throwing the knife way across the room. It was very loud.
Your stab popped a party balloon, scaring a nearby child.
You stabbed someone in their thick wig and had to ask for it back. It was awkward.
Woah!  You stabbed a bird that just flew by!  You're like a ninja!
The air was mortally wounded by your thrust.
You put someone’s eye out! Hope you’re happy!
Would you press so vigorously if this were a "Hug" button? Think about it.
You accidentally stabbed your best friend! But you’re close enough that you can laugh about it, which is great.
en.VOTING_ON_CASE_PROMPT_TEXT: Which case do you want to investigate?
en.VOTING_ON_CASE_FOOTER_TEXT: You committed one of these murders. Try to get players to pick the other one.
en.VERDICT_REVEAL_GUILTY_DETECTIVE: Correct! You've earned a detective point!
en.VERDICT_REVEAL_GUILTY_MURDERER: You still keep your murder point.
en.VERDICT_REVEAL_INNOCENT_DETECTIVE: If you did get it correct you earned a detective point. But you won't find out now.
en.CREDITS_THEME_9: And I caught you so off guard
en.CREDITS_THEME_13: Am I next? We must assume
en.CREDITS_THEME_17: Saw a shadow in the hall
en.CREDITS_THEME_19: You didn’t notice me at all
en.CREDITS_THEME_25: And I caught you so off guard
en.CREDITS_THEME_26: Did you even try to get away?
en.CREDITS_THEME_27: Light your candle, give me a guess
